citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process from 11:18AM-
12:18PM on 28-DEC-2021.
Called facility representative and left a voicemail message, followed by an email message. Spoke with an employee
onsite, and was informed that most of the staff was on holiday break, and no one was currently onsite to conduct the
inspection. Waited 60 minutes with no response to messages.
End Section

narrative:
2.38(b) 
   
Miscellaneous. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process from 11:18AM-
12:18PM on 28-DEC-2021. 
 
Called facility representative and left a voicemail message, followed by an email message.  Spoke with an employee 
onsite, and was informed that most of the staff was on holiday break, and no one was currently onsite to conduct the 
inspection.  Waited 60 minutes with no response to messages. 
 
 
 
End Section
